reviews.review: Requires two controllers for local Co-op.

Ótimos puzzles, uma ótima história, divertido, engraçado e até cativante. 10/10.

Easily one of the best games ever made. Valve really out did themselves here. Even though it came out in 2011 it's still better than more recent games. The writing, designing, and coding team all did outstanding and if they didn't get raises after this then the Earth should be hit by a meteorite.
é engraçado com os amigos, e tbm tem uma historia boa
very fun, strong single player and very fun co op
para quem gosta de jogos de puzzle é bem divertido.
Good game. I see it as Valve's best.
I really love this game. Great if you like puzzles and sassy robots.

An amazing coop game, that has been my favorite game since i was a kid.
This is a great puzzle game that you can sink countless hours in. Both the single player and coop campaigns are great and the ability to play community made levels makes it that much better.
incredibly fun in coop, great story as well

Everything you liked about Portal 1 and more.
o jogo tem uma história e jogabilidade incríveis, sem contar o sistema de criação de fases e o multiplayer
Estou na metade do game e sinceramente que jogo meus amigos, ele traz puzzles muito bons e te prende na historia até a metade que é onde eu estou e pretendo me viciar mais nele
fun game to play with friends, and pretty good story. also 99 cents due to sale is epic
The cake was not a lie and I loved it.

You don't have to read yet another review to know that this is a brilliant game, however, I want to highlight one of it's most unique aspects. There are not many co-op split screen games out there that offer an great experience for hardcore as well as entirely new casual gamers in the exact same play session. This is clearly one of them. I highly recommend it to those who want to introduce close friends or partners into a fun new hobby.
A great puzzler with a great story. Not something you always see.
Eines der besten Games überhaupt. Schade das es nie einen dritten Teil geben wird.
blue always wins rock paper scissors wtf
Прыгаю через порталы и даже не нервничаю. Игра-головоломка с мерзкими роботами. 10/10
The most fun co-op game ever
Полноценная игра в отличие от первого портала. Спасибо за озвучку Уитли, она прекрасна

Portal 2 is an amazing game even 8 years later. The singleplayer campaign is so immersive. It tells an amazing story that expands on the universe built by the first game so much. The co-op is a fantastic way to waste time and have a blast with your friends, and the community made test chambers on the workshop are always a great challenge. This game has stood the test of time and continues to be one of if not the best puzzle game on the market. The best part? It's only $0.99 on sale! So what reason do you have to not play it?
This may be the best thing humanity has ever created. STOP WRITING FAKE BAD REVIEWS!
